name: Instant Pot® Pulled Chicken
author: bcobb35
summary: Great, easy, and fast BBQ pulled chicken in the Instant Pot®, no grilling needed! The grandchildren really enjoy this and ask for it often.
ingredients: 2 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts, or more to taste
directions: Mix salt, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and pepper in a bowl
Cut chicken into 3- to 4-inch pieces and place in a large resealable plastic bag
Sprinkle the salt mixture over the chicken in the bag
Seal the bag and shake to completely coat the chicken
Pour water into a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Place the wire rack into the pot
Select Meat/Poultry function; set timer for 50 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes
Add 1/2 cup of liquid from the pot and liquid smoke; mix well
Serve on buns and top with barbeque sauce
